text: o while under Frequency Fence control. Your future incarnational selves will be those humans faced with the 2976 cata- clysm. Through the Bridge Zone Project the severity of this future can be lessened. If the Bridge Zone Project is successful, the D-4 time continuum, in which the Zetas now have their strong hold, will become free from Dracos-Zeta con- trol, so the 2976 AD explosion of Earth will be avoided for the D-3 Earth. The Resistance will still attempt to infiltrate and control D-3 Earth, but their chances of success will be greatly reduced after losing control of the D-4 con- tinuum. Humans remaining in the D-3 time cycle will not benefit from the genetic acceleration opportunity that is open to Bridge Zone humans, as they will be 167
